sect2.title: Dépendances d'installation de Sed
sect2.para: (Dernière vérification effectuée auprès de la version &sed-depversion;.)
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: ar, as, ld, ranlib Coreutils: cat, chmod, expr, hostname, install, ls, mv, rm, echo, sleep, tr Diffutils: cmp Gcc: cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc Glibc: getconf Grep: egrep, fgrep, grep M4: m4 Make: make Gawk: gawk Sed: sed Texinfo: install-info, makeinfo
